name: The Blue Clock Drop
description:
Dive into the clock drop based on Hanley's very own blue clock!

Work your way through lots of random levels, dictated by the all-powerful, all-knowing clock, which will throw nuts, bolts and a whole lot more at you to prevent you from reaching the top! 

Avoid blades, lasers, boss's, missiles, meteor showers, what else could you want ?!?!?

Click to play in browser or download the android or ios version below!

No keys required! Just tap or click to navigate yourself through the oncoming havoc!

Download for IOS and Android : https://thomas-worrell.itch.io/the-blueclockdrop
